Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'M MISS U HAIR', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 8 x 1.7 inches; 11.36 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:70e9f5c0d3612527c251dde5937efab3]] This Miss U Hair is just pass shoulder length with good curl. This is a good quality character, cosplay, or Halloween wig. Cap construction is good and comfy, but no combs to secure in place, so it did slide around on my head. It came with a wig cap. The part is fluffy and thick, as is the hair line, so I was unable to get a natural look from forehead to hairline, but for the function of Cosplay character, this is on the higher quality.
Review Title: Nice for Cosplay purposes.
Rating: 4.0

reference_summary:
&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
YRMJK
{'Brand': 'YRMJK', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Soft', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.1 x 3.1 x 2.7 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '738426030676', 'Manufacturer': 'MUTTUS'}
[[VIDEOID:b2565b535e1d3f3297ca6703d7f26383]] A tip for those would never used an electric toothbrush: put the toothbrush into your mouth and then turn on (and off before removing from mouth). Lol, I got toothpaste everywhere and learned this the hard way. Functionally, the vibrations are powerful by default, so if you are sensitive like me, turn it down. I’ve used it 4 times now and the first time it was strange, but now I am use to it. There are 5 different pulsating settings (see video). The plus and minus icons allow for easy and quick adjustment of how hard/soft - fast/slow the vibrating brush-head will pulsate. The bristles on the brush attachment is firm, but soft on gums; so there is some bend to the bristles and was comfortable for me. It sits on a charger to power it up via usb cord that plugs into standard charger plug. The case is beyond awesome. I travel for conferences and this stores the brush and charger with the brush head in a beautiful pink bottom and clear top hard case. Easy to pack and go. My teeth feels very clean after using this electronic toothbrush. For my set, I have 5 extra brush head attachments for exchanging after wearing out. This set looks exactly like advertised. I love the pink design. It is long and slender with sliver trim. My video will show the different settings and I hope you can hear the slight vibration changes because you could easily tell from the sound of the pulse by which setting it is on through a couple of uses. My favorite thing about it is that the charger is small and doesn’t take up any room on the sink countertop. The travel case is sturdy. The quality of this brush is so great that I don’t want to ever go back to a standard manual toothbrush. I highly recommend if you need a travel brush that is electronic! Update: A week later and I still love it! Everything works very well!!
Great travel toothbrush!
Persephone Ombre Blonde Lace Front Wig Wavy Soft Brown Roots Ash Blonde Ombre Wigs for Women Glueless Long Wavy Synthetic Wig with Middle Parting Heat Resistant 22 Inches
Persephone

[[VIDEOID:e6486dec3002b28b72d65864eaf95d53]] Y’all!!! I can’t give this wig enough stars! For the price, this is an outstanding wig - Persephone Ombré Blonde! Now, I cut the pace all the way back and place it about 1-2” behind my hairline, so I’ve pulled out my front hair to blend with the wig. It does have wig combs to keep it secure and, although it comes with an awesome wig cap, I do NOT wear a cap. Stays on securely all day. Great wig cap construction with adjustable straps to help custom to head. Didn’t tangle. Soft! Huge fan!! This is an outstanding wig and the price is a great value!!! L O V E !!
LOVE!

The part is fluffy and thick, as is the hair line, so I was unable to get a natural look from forehead to hairline, but for the function of Cosplay character, this is on the higher quality.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Continues to favor electronic dental care products designed for travel and convenience, while increasingly interested in fashionable hair accessories, particularly wigs for cosplay and other occasions.
- **Usage Experience:** Appreciates functionality and ease of use, as evidenced by sharing tips for first-time users in both dental care and hair products. The user adeptly navigates various product features that enhance usability and comfort.
- **Design & Features:** Drawn to aesthetic elements such as sleek designs and pink hues, they also seek out wigs that not only enhance personal appearance but also fit comfortably, reflecting a desire for both style and practicality.
- **Sensitivity Consideration:** Values comfort, preferring adjustable settings for sensitivity in dental products and ensuring wigs fit well without discomfort, acknowledging the importance of a secure fit in both categories.
- **Maintenance & Quality:** Prioritizes high-quality, durable brands that are easy to maintain, applying this standard to both dental and hair products.
- **Positive Engagement:** Maintains a positive attitude towards product performance, reflecting satisfaction and brand loyalty, which carries through in their assessments of hair products.
- **Recommendation Behavior:** Willingly recommends products, exemplifying a strong trust in their quality and functionality across both dental and wig purchases.

Overall, the user enjoys effective, aesthetically pleasing, and travel-friendly personal care solutions, whether through dental hygiene or stylish hair options, now actively engaging with products suited for cosplay and themed events.
